premise: It is sad to observe the fruits of ignorance.
hypothesis: It is sad to observe the effects of ignorance.

explanation: NA

premise: It is sad to observe the fruits of ignorance.
hypothesis: It is amusing to observe the fruits of ignorance.
label: Contradiction
explanation: The two statements appear to be contradictory. Thus,  it can not be also amusing to observe the fruits of ignorance at the same time.
